name: Littlest Pet Shop: Winter
description: Littlest Pet Shop: Winter stars the characters from the Hasbro line of toys of the same name. Players can play with each of the pets in a winter environment. New pets can be unlocked by progressing through the game. Kibble Coins can be collected in mini-games to unlock accessories and dress up the pets in different outfits. The game includes 16 mini-games for a single player or with up to three other friends via a wireless connection. Mini-games include ball balancing, card match, coin toss, digging, swinging, and even flying in the clouds.
